title: How it Works - Book of Junior Science 2014 (Vol.1,Revised Second
description:
This second revised edition of the How It Works Book of Junior Science has been written to feed young minds with the most inspiring and amazing things about the world we live in. Jam-packed full of facts, trivia and easy-to-follow diagrams, this is a comprehensive guide to our planet, the animals we share it with, our own bodies and the way science affects our day-to-day lives. 

Everything you need to know about science and the world we live in

Science in action 
- From fireworks to football, discover how science is used in the world around us

The human body
- Learn about what's inside your body 

Planet Earth
- Discover the science behind Earth's most exciting creations

Amazing animals 
- Meet some of the world's most interesting inhabitants


Also inside...

Science in action 
- Amazing chemistry
- The science of fire
- States of matter
- Superconductors
- Football physics
- G-force explained

The human body
- What are you made of? 
- How do allergies affect us?
- How the liver works
- What's inside your head? 
- Why do we get spots?
- How senses work

Planet Earth
- 25 Earthquake facts
- How plants work
- The water cycle
- Predicting the weather
- Rogue waves
- The carbon cycle

Amazing animals
- 10 deadliest animals
- Vampire bats
- Deadly dinosaurs
- Dog noses
- Giant pandas
- Scorpions

How It Works Book of Junior Science Second Revised Edition
Book Language: English
Pages: 180
File Type: Pdf
File Size: 126 MB
